name: Typefighters - Jam version
description:
Created for the 17th Eggplant Gamejam "Designing Around Language":

https://itch.io/jam/eggjam-17-designing-around-language

Shoot the words to defeat them and gain their letters!

Then add letters to yourself to become stronger.

Made using Godot 4.

Warning: Godot 4 web builds will crash Macs apparently! I've put a downloadable mac build up but I haven't tested it.

Less scary warning: game's fulla bugs

Controls:

Movement - WASD or arrow keys

Aiming - Mouse cursor

Shoot - Mouse click

Open Letter List - press I

In Letter List:

Pick letters by clicking on them. Move your mouse to move them around your wordtank. WASD/arrows to point the letter in that direction. Click to place, right click to cancel placing letter.

I to close Letter List.

Credits:

Game by Velleic!

Paper image by Kiwihug on Unsplash

Font Literata Book by Google Fonts
